To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private ClosingMarubozu _closingmarubozu;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_closingmarubozu = ClosingMarubozu(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_closingmarubozu.IsReady)
{
    var current = _closingmarubozu.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.closingmarubozu = self.ClosingMarubozu(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.closingmarubozu.IsReady:
    current = self.closingmarubozu.Current.Value
